name: Nebula Town
description:
CONTROLS: Z/J and arrow buttons.

Hi! 

I'm NoboMarkerPen, I'm 10 years old, and this is my first ever computer game. Lockdown made me do it. I made it with my mind and my fingers using Aseprite and GBStudio. 

It's an RPG where you trek around with your friend Frankie and discover a cake-eating sheep, a derpy spider and an over-excited researcher.

This page is managed by my dad, so don't do swears or stuff or he'll just delete them.

Leave your fan messages in the comment section below. 

Goodbye forever. I've already said too much.
